titleStmt.title: The massacre at Paris with the death of the Duke of Guise. As it was plaide by the right honourable the Lord high Admirall his Seruants. Written by Christopher Marlow.
titleStmt.author: Marlowe, Christopher, 1564-1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E[dward] A[llde] for Edward White, dwelling neere the little north doore of S. Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A"; the last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the little north doore of S. Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun
